ExtensionManifest.Author: Retouching Academy
ExtensionManifest.Abstract:
Fire up your workflow with the Beauty Retouch Workflow Accelerator! This extension panel combines basic Beauty retouching scripts, tool and adjustment layer shortcuts, which will add simplicity to and speed up your workflow by performing the tedious and repetitive parts of your routine. Utilizing a few advanced and extremely helpful scripts, the Workflow Accelerator will also save you hours of work in the short and long term as well as help you achieve accurate, repeatable and top-quality results.
Once this extension is installed, "BEAUTY RETOUCH" can be applied from "Window" menu>"Extension" submenu>"BEAUTY RETOUCH". On disabling, "Window">"Extension">"BEAUTY RETOUCH" will be closed.
